description.mainEffect: When retrieving an item from a chest, there's a 100% chance of finding an add-on of Very Rare Rarity or lower.
description.secondaryEffect: 10/25/50% chance for a second add-on of Uncommon Rarity or lower.
description.additionalEffect: Allows you to keep any add-ons your item has equipped upon escaping.

description.mainEffect: Instantly heal the equivalent of 1 health state.
description.secondaryEffect: Grants a +50% haste status effect for 3 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Ignores the Exhausted status effect but causes it for 60/50/40 seconds.

description.mainEffect: The auras of the last 1/2/3 survivors are permanently revealed to you once certain conditions have been met.
description.secondaryEffect: Those survivors also have your aura revealed to them.
description.additionalEffect: Resets its effect once you are hooked.

description.mainEffect: Whenever the killer performs the break or damage action, their aura is revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.
Press and hold the active ability button to reset a dropped pallet to its upright position.
description.secondaryEffect: Grants the ability to see the auras of all dropped but not yet destroyed pallets.

description.mainEffect: Start the trial with 3 tokens.
description.secondaryEffect: Consume 1 token to rummage through an already-opened chest for an item.
description.additionalEffect: Rummage through chests 40/60/80% faster, available once per chest.

description.mainEffect: Start the trial with a -25% progression penalty for good skill checks while healing another survivor.
description.secondaryEffect: Succeeding a good skill check grants 1 token up to a maximum of 3/4/5 tokens.
description.additionalEffect: Each token grants a stackable progression bonus for succeeding a good skill check while healing.

description.mainEffect: When unhooking a survivor, the killer's aura is revealed to you for 8 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: The unhooked survivor suppresses their scratch marks and pools of blood for 4/6/8 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Increases their haste status effect by +7%.

description.mainEffect: Activates for 10 seconds when another survivor is picked up.
description.secondaryEffect: Starting to run while active grants a +50% haste status effect for 5 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Causes the Exhausted status effect for 30/25/20 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Reduces the duration of stagger upon landing by -75%.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses all noises associated with falling.
description.additionalEffect: Grants a +50% haste status effect for 3 seconds upon landing, causing the Exhausted status effect for 60/50/40 seconds.

description.mainEffect: While repairing a generator, its aura is revealed to all other survivors within 32 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: If the killer downs a survivor while you are repairing, you see the auras of all other survivors for 8/9/10 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Upon completing a healing action, the healed survivor benefits from increased action speeds in healing, unlocking, cleansing, and blessing.
description.additionalEffect: Increases their action speeds by 12/14/16% until the next time they take damage.

description.mainEffect: When healing yourself or another, grunts of pain and healing noises are suppressed.
description.secondaryEffect: Failed healing skill checks do not trigger a loud noise notification.
description.additionalEffect: Applies only a 3/2/1% regression penalty.

description.main_effect: After repairing Generators for a total of 50%, Blast Mine activates.
description.secondary_effect: Press the Active Ability button near a partially progressed Generator to install a Trap, which stays active for 100/110/120 seconds.
description.additional_effect: When the Killer damages the Trapped Generator, its Trap explodes half-way through, stunning them and blinding anyone nearby. The Auras of Trapped Generators are revealed to all Survivors in yellow.

description.main_effect: When either you or the Obsession become injured by any means, Blood Pact activates.
description.secondary_effect: Your Auras are constantly revealed to one another. Completing a Healing Action on the Obsession or having them complete one on yourself grants both a 5/6/7% Haste Status Effect.
description.additional_effect: This effect lasts for as long as you both remain within 16 metres of each other. Blood Pact deactivates after leaving this radius and is temporarily disabled if you are the Obsession.

description.main_effect: Once you are one Hook away from instant death, Blood Rush activates.
description.secondary_effect: Press the Active Ability button to lose a Health State and instantly recover from the Exhausted Status Effect.
description.additional_effect: Causes the Broken Status Effect for 28/24/20 seconds while you are automatically healing back to Healthy. Blood Rush is disabled for the remainder of the Trial after use.

description.main_effect: While being carried by the Killer, the following effects apply.
description.secondary_effect: Increases the strength of Struggle Effects on the Killer from your Wiggling by 60/70/80%. Suppresses the ability of the Killer to read the Auras of all Hooks within 16 metres.
description.additional_effect: Grants +33% of your current Wiggle progression upon landing if the Killer drops from height.

description.main_effect: Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
description.secondary_effect: The Auras of all other Survivors within 20/28/36 metres of your location are revealed to you.
description.additional_effect: We have to work as a team, I need you to survive so that I can survive!

description.main_effect: Press and hold the Active Ability button on a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem.
description.secondary_effect: All Survivors benefit from increased Altruistic Healing speeds by 50/75/100% when not using a Med-Kit.
description.additional_effect: If a Survivor is injured, their Aura will be revealed to all other Survivors.

description.main_effect: Press and hold the Active Ability button on a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem.
description.secondary_effect: All Survivors benefit from a 2% Haste Status Effect.
description.additional_effect: This effect lingers for 2/3/4 seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.

description.main_effect: Press and hold the Active Ability button on a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem.
description.secondary_effect: All Survivors benefit from a 90/95/100% bonus to the Recovery speed.
description.additional_effect: Unlocks the Self-Recovery ability, allowing you to fully recover from the Dying State.

description.main_effect: Press and hold the Active Ability button on a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem.
description.secondary_effect: All Survivors benefit from the Auras of all Chests and Generators being revealed to them in blue.
description.additional_effect: Increases Action speeds for Blessing and Cleansing by 6/8/10% while you have a lit Boon Totem.

description.main_effect: Press and hold the Active Ability button on a Dull or Hex Totem to bless it and create a Boon Totem.
description.secondary_effect: All Survivors benefit from Scratch Marks being suppressed.
description.additional_effect: Auras are hidden from The Killer. Both effects linger for 2/3/4 seconds after leaving the Boon Totem's range.

description.main_effect: You are fuelled with unexpected energy when saving an ally from a Hook.
description.secondary_effect: Survivors you unhook benefit from the Endurance Status Effect.
description.additional_effect: Extends the duration of their Endurance Status Effect by 6/8/10 seconds. Extends the Haste Status Effect by 10 seconds.

description.main_effect: Increases your Healing speed by 30/40/50%.
description.secondary_effect: Reduces the Healing efficiency of Med-Kits by -20%.
description.additional_effect: "Basic Botany Knowledge could save your life someday" — Claudette Morel.

description.main_effect: Each time you are unhooked or unhook yourself, the Hook breaks and the Killer's Aura is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: A Hook broken by Breakdown takes 180 seconds to respawn.
description.additional_effect: "Charge from the Belly of the Beast. Here's a sketch/painting on a piece of wood I saw by the side of this road. I felt like it got a story to tell. And it didn't waste its second chance." — Jeff, ink and oil wash on slice of wood, 12x16

description.main_effect: Grants a 5/6/7 % Haste Status Effect when within 5 meters of a carried Survivor.
description.secondary_effect: Increases the Wiggle speed of the carried Survivor by +25%.
description.additional_effect: "Come, we are going to rip our way out of this." — Yui Kimura

description.main_effect: Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability. When healing a Survivor in the Dying State, Buckle Up activates.
description.secondary_effect: Completing a Healing Action grants the dying Survivor a +50% Haste Status Effect for 3/4/5 seconds.
description.additional_effect: "Ghost beaters never leave a man behind." — Ash Williams

description.main_effect: Hiding inside a Locker for 14/13/12 seconds while carrying a depleted Item will replenish its Charges to 99%.
description.secondary_effect: Each use of Built to Last reduces this percentage by -33%.
description.additional_effect: "Architecture is the soul of civilisation." — Felix Richter

description.main_effect: Prevents Crows from being alerted and suppresses the urge to scream from any cause.
description.secondary_effect: Suppresses all noises related to unlocking Chests and cleansing or blessing Totems.
description.additional_effect: Reduces their Interaction speed by 40/35/30%.

description.main_effect: Pauses the Struggle Phase timer for 26/30/34 seconds if another Survivor is within 16 meters of your Hook.
description.secondary_effect: Activates only in the Struggle Phase.
description.additional_effect: "So, remember once you get in there... pretend like you don't care. There you go, you're learning my friend. You're learning." — Steve Harrington

description.main_effect: Shining a Flashlight grants a +50% Haste Status Effect.
description.secondary_effect: Blinding the Killer causes them to suffer from a -20% Hindered Status Effect for 6 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Has a cool-down of 80/70/60 seconds after blinding the Killer.

description.main_effect: After repairing Generators for a total of 70/60/50%, Chemical Trap activates.
description.secondary_effect: Install a Trap at a dropped Pallet, which will slow the Killer by -50% for 4 seconds when triggered.
description.additional_effect: Reveals the Auras of Trapped Pallets to all Survivors in yellow.

description.main_effect: After cleansing or blessing a Totem, Clairvoyance activates.
description.secondary_effect: See the Auras of various objects within 64 meters for 8/9/10 seconds.
description.additional_effect: "Does anyone else see that? Just me?" — Mikaela Reid

description.main_effect: Start with 1/2/3 Tokens and gain +1 per successful Great Skill Check, up to 5.
description.secondary_effect: Transforms a failed Skill Check of another Survivor into a Good Skill Check.
description.additional_effect: "Cannot hurt to have another set of eyes on the problem." — Jonah Vasquez

description.main_effect: Cleanse Totems 20% faster.
description.secondary_effect: Gain a 20% Cleansing Speed bonus per cleansed Totem.
description.additional_effect: The Aura of the Totem farthest from you is revealed for 2/3/4 seconds.

description.main_effect: After performing a Rush Vault action in a Chase, Cut Loose activates for 4/5/6 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Suppresses the Loud Noise Notification and resets the timer when performing another Rush Vault.
description.additional_effect: "I know how we can get out of here! Quick, this way!" — Thalita Lyra

description.main_effect: Performing a Rush Vault or rushing out of a Locker prevents leaving Scratch Marks for 3 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Has a cool-down of 60/50/40 seconds.
description.additional_effect: "Another show's off and runnin', Dance with me, cuz there's a storm a commin'..." — Kate Denson's "Dance with Me"

description.main_effect: The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 5/7/10 seconds as soon as they come within 24 meters of your location after completing a Generator.
description.secondary_effect: Dark Sense deactivates after revealing the Killer's Aura.
description.additional_effect: Helps you understand how the Killer thinks.

description.main_effect: Press the Active Ability button while running to gain the Endurance Status Effect for 0.5 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Activates after being rescued from a Hook or self-unhooking. Deactivates after use.
description.additional_effect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds. Cannot be used when Exhausted.

description.main_effect: Increases the Odds of triggering Skill Checks by 6/8/10% while repairing or healing.
description.secondary_effect: Causes Skill Checks to appear randomly.
description.additional_effect: Reduces penalty for missed Skill Checks by -50%.

description.main_effect: Interacting with a Locker while sprinting makes the Locker's doors swing open and close swiftly, feigning a Survivor's entry.
description.secondary_effect: Triggers a Loud Noise Notification and suppresses Scratch Marks and Pools of Blood for 3 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Has a cooldown of 60/50/40 seconds.

description.main_effect: After unhooking or being unhooked, it activates for 40/50/60 seconds. Succeed a Skill Check to stab the Killer and escape from their grasp.
description.secondary_effect: Stuns the Killer for 4 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Causes you to become the next Obsession and disables after use.

description.main_effect: The Auras of the 3 closest Generators are revealed to you at all times.
description.secondary_effect: Increases Repair speed on these Generators by 4/5/6%.
description.additional_effect: If holding a Map, the Generators are automatically added to it.

description.main_effect: After performing a Safe Hook Rescue on another Survivor, grants the ability to unhook yourself.
description.secondary_effect: After successfully unhooking yourself, you suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 100/80/60 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Not available during the second Hook stage or if you are hooked as the last Survivor.

description.main_effect: Increases Healing and Unhooking speeds by 10/12/14% for each injured, hooked, or dying Survivor.
description.secondary_effect: Up to a maximum of 40/48/56% speed increase.
description.additional_effect: Boosts action speeds during emergencies.

description.main_effect: Each time a Generator is completed, reveals the Auras of Generators, Chests, and Totems within 32/48/64 meters for 10 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: If holding a Map, any objects revealed are tracked.
description.additional_effect: Great for locating important items.

description.main_effect: Start the Trial with 3 Tokens. Prevents the Killer from reading your Aura for 6/8/10 seconds when consuming a Token.
description.secondary_effect: Suppresses Scratch Marks for the same duration.
description.additional_effect: Recharges 1 Token every 30 seconds within the Killer's Terror Radius.

description.main_effect: After being within the Killer's Terror Radius for 40/35/30 seconds without being chased, activates.
description.secondary_effect: Press the Active Ability button while crouched to throw a pebble, creating a distraction for the Killer 20 meters away.
description.additional_effect: Triggers a Loud Noise Notification and creates fake Scratch Marks.

description.main_effect: While healthy and running, press the Active Ability button to gain a 25% Haste Status Effect for 2 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: May cause an additional effect like Exposed Status, extended Haste, screaming, or gaining a rare item.
description.additional_effect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.

description.main_effect: Injured Survivors can see your Aura when within 32/64/96 meters of you.
description.secondary_effect: You heal other Survivors 10% faster.
description.additional_effect: Helps coordinate healing efforts.

description.main_effect: The Auras of injured or dying Survivors are revealed to you within 64/96/128 meters.
description.secondary_effect: Does not reveal the Aura of Survivors being carried by the Killer.
description.additional_effect: Assists in locating teammates who need healing.

description.main_effect: Whenever another Survivor is hooked, gains 1/2/3 Tokens up to 9/18/27.
description.secondary_effect: Each Token grants a 1% progression bonus after a Great Skill Check on a Generator.
description.additional_effect: Tokens are consumed after a successful Great Skill Check.

description.main_effect: Increases your walking speed by 10/15/20%.
description.secondary_effect: Unlocks the ability to see your own Scratch Marks.
description.additional_effect: Useful for stealthy movement.

description.main_effect: After repairing Generators for 70/60/50%, activates.
description.secondary_effect: Enter a Locker and press the Ability button to craft a Flash Grenade.
description.additional_effect: Flashbang is left behind when escaping the Trial.

description.main_effect: While in the Dying State, 50% of your Recovery progress is converted to Wiggle progress up to 40/45/50%.
description.secondary_effect: Activated when the Killer picks you up.
description.additional_effect: Useful for escape attempts when downed.

description.main_effect: Succeeding a Great Skill Check while repairing reveals the Killer's Aura to you for 4/5/6 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Focuses on Great Skill Checks to gain insight.
description.additional_effect: Helps understand the Killer's movements.

description.main_effect: While healthy and healing without a Med-Kit, trade 1 Health State with another Survivor.
description.secondary_effect: Instantly heals them to Injured or full health while you become injured.
description.additional_effect: Causes Broken Status Effect for 80/70/60 seconds.

description.main_effect: Increases your Repair speed, and that of the other Survivor(s) who completed the repairs with you, by +5% for the next 45/60/75 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: None
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: When rushing out of a Locker, stun the Killer for 3 seconds if they are within range.
description.secondary_effect: Head On causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Cannot be used when Exhausted or when you have accrued Idle Crows.

description.main_effect: Grants a permanent 5/6/7% Haste Status Effect once the Exit Gates are powered.
description.secondary_effect: None
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: After hitting a Great Skill Check while repairing or healing, gains +1 Token up to 6 Tokens.
description.secondary_effect: Increases Skill Check Trigger odds, Skill Check Rotation speed, and Bonus progression by varying percentages per Token.
description.additional_effect: Loses all Tokens if succeeding a Good Skill Check, failing a Skill Check, or if interrupted.

description.main_effect: Can see Scratch Marks of other Survivors.
description.secondary_effect: Reveals the Killer's Aura for 3/4/5 seconds if another Survivor loses a Health State within 32 meters.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Automatically heals 1 Health State while hiding in a Locker for 10/9/8 seconds when injured or suffering from Deep Wound.
description.secondary_effect: Does not activate if suffering from the Broken Status Effect.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Permanently reduces the Repair Charges requirement of all Generators in the Trial by 8/9/10 Charges.
description.secondary_effect: Automatically enters the Injured State and suffers from the Broken Status Effect for the remainder of the Trial.
description.additional_effect: Disables all Invocation Perks after completion.

description.main_effect: Reduces Grunts of Pain volume by 25/50/75% while in the Injured State.
description.secondary_effect: Cannot be used when Exhausted.
description.additional_effect: Does not cause the Exhausted Status Effect.

description.main_effect: While hooked, reveals the Auras of all Survivors to each other and reveals the Killer's Aura if within 8/12/16 meters.
description.secondary_effect: While another Survivor is hooked, reveals the Auras of other Survivors and the Killer's Aura if within 8/12/16 meters.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Increases Action speeds of other Survivors by 15/20/25% within 8 meters.
description.secondary_effect: Effect lingers for 15 seconds after leaving range.
description.additional_effect: Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Leader at a time.

description.main_effect: When the last Survivor remaining, reveals the Aura of the Hatch within 24/28/32 meters.
description.secondary_effect: None
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Suppresses the sound of footsteps while running when healthy.
description.secondary_effect: Has a cooldown of 28/24/20 seconds after a Rush Vault.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Reduces Scratch Marks duration by 3/4/5 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Reduces the chance of Scratch Marks patches appearing by -60%.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Grants a +50% Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds after a Rushed Vault.
description.secondary_effect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
description.additional_effect: Cannot be used when Exhausted.

description.main_effect: Suppresses Pools of Blood, Scratch Marks, and Grunts of Pain for 70/80/90 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Activates only when you're the sole healthy Survivor.
description.additional_effect: None

description.main_effect: Suppresses Pools of Blood and Scratch Marks for 40/50/60 seconds.
description.secondary_effect: Recharges 1 second for every second spent healing another Survivor.
description.additional_effect: Deactivates when healthy or in the Dying State.

description.main_effect: Suppresses Grunts of Pain and Pools of Blood for 10 seconds while hiding in a Locker.
description.secondary_effect: Reveals the Auras of other Survivors and the closest Generator upon exiting the Locker.
description.additional_effect: Has a cooldown of 40/35/30 seconds.

description.main_effect: Grants the Endurance Status Effect for 6/8/10 seconds after healing another Survivor.
description.secondary_effect: Grants 1/2/3% Haste Status Effect while running and suffering from Deep Wound.
description.additional_effect: Endurance is canceled prematurely when performing a Conspicuous Action.

description.main_effect: After three Protection Hits, shields you from going down next time while injured.
description.secondary_effect: Reveals your Aura to the Killer if fully healed and more than 12/14/16 meters away.
description.additional_effect: Deactivates when put into the Dying State. Increases odds of being Obsession by +100%.

description.mainEffect: You suffer from the Broken Status Effect for the entire Trial.
description.secondaryEffect: Pools of Blood are suppressed, and Grunts of Pain are reduced by 25/50/75% when injured or dying.
description.additionalEffect: Recovery speed is increased by 15/20/25%, and you can fully recover from the Dying State.

description.mainEffect: Increases your Action speeds in Healing and Unhooking by 30/40/50% when Exit Gates are powered.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases the Haste Status Effect of Survivors unhooked by +7%. Reveals the Auras of the other Survivors.
description.additionalEffect: Grants 50/75/100% bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Altruism Category.

description.mainEffect: Reveals the Killer's Aura to you whenever the Killer reads your Aura.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases Action speeds in Repairing, Healing, and Cleansing by 2/4/6%.
description.additionalEffect: Automatically reveals your Aura to the Killer for 3 seconds every 30 seconds when you are the Obsession.

description.mainEffect: Prevents your Aura from being revealed to the Killer for 60/70/80 seconds after being unhooked.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses Grunts of Pain when injured and grants the Endurance Status Effect.
description.additionalEffect: Deactivates once the Exit Gates are powered.

description.mainEffect: Increases the radius of all Aura-reading abilities by 8/12/16 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Survivors can only be affected by one instance at a time.

description.mainEffect: Extends the duration of the On-hit Speed Boost by +2 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Cannot be used when Exhausted.

description.mainEffect: Increases your Repair speed by 8/9/10% for Dull Totems and by 16/18/20% for Hex Totems.
description.secondaryEffect: Deactivates when losing a Health State.

description.mainEffect: Suppresses Scratch Marks, Pools of Blood, and Grunts of Pain for 5/6/7 seconds after stunning the Killer.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses Scratch Marks and Pools of Blood.

description.mainEffect: Increases Unlocking speed of Chests by 40/60/80% when in the Injured State.
description.secondaryEffect: Reduces Hearing range of noises related to Unlocking by -8 meters.
description.additionalEffect: Guarantees an Emergency Med-Kit when unlocking a Chest.

description.mainEffect: Allows you to silently enter the Dying State while crouching and motionless.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses Grunts of Pain and Pools of Blood.
description.additionalEffect: Grants full recovery from the Dying State and heals instantly, granting a +50% Haste Status Effect.

description.mainEffect: Reveals the Auras of closed Chests and Items within 16/24/32 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases Odds of finding higher Rarity Items in Chests.

description.mainEffect: Prevents leaving Scratch Marks for 6/8/10 seconds after completing a Generator.
description.secondaryEffect: Prevents leaving Scratch Marks.

description.mainEffect: Allows converting 1.5% of Repair progression into 1 Token.
description.secondaryEffect: Progresses the Generator by 1% per Token, consuming all Tokens.
description.additionalEffect: Deactivates and loses all Tokens upon losing a Health State.

description.mainEffect: Reveals the Auras of available Pallets while in the Dying State.
description.secondaryEffect: Allows dropping a nearby Pallet to stun the Killer and escape their grasp.
description.additionalEffect: Deactivates after successful use.

description.mainEffect: Auditory warning upon looking in the Killer's direction within a 45-degree cone.
description.secondaryEffect: Cool-down of 60/45/30 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Increases Repair speed by 6/8/10% for every other Survivor within 4 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Effect is also applied to other Survivors in range.

description.mainEffect: Suppresses Loud Noise Notification triggered by rushing to vault Windows, Pallets, or Lockers.
description.secondaryEffect: Has a cool-down of 30/25/20 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Reveals Generators' Auras within 36 meters while being chased.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases Repair speed of other Survivors by 6/7/8%.

description.mainEffect: Grants 40/45/50% of your missing Healing Progression when another Survivor loses a Health State within 32 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Only activates when you are in the Injured State.

description.mainEffect: Halt Sacrifice Process of a hooked Survivor for 20/25/30 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Pauses Skill Checks if hooked Survivor is in Struggle Phase.

description.mainEffect: Highlights a Generator's Aura after repairing for at least 3 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Entering a Locker triggers a Loud Noise Notification at the highlighted Generator.

description.mainEffect: Allows blocking a Generator with The Entity for 30 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Reveals the Aura of the blocked Generator to all Survivors in white.

description.mainEffect: Grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest to guarantee a basic Flashlight.
description.secondaryEffect: After successfully blinding the Killer, the Killer suffers from the Blindness Status Effect for 20/25/30 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Increases Action speeds by 3/6/9% when in the Injured State.
description.secondaryEffect: Applicable to Repairing, Healing, Sabotaging, Unhooking, Vaulting, and more.

description.mainEffect: Instantly gain 40/45/50% of your missing Healing progression after being unhooked or unhooking yourself.
description.secondaryEffect: Only activates after unhooking.

description.mainEffect: While repairing Generators, succeed 5/4/3 Good or Great Skill Checks to activate Rookie Spirit for the remainder of the Trial.
description.secondaryEffect: The Auras of any regressing Generators are revealed to you until they stop regressing.
description.additionalEffect: "I'll stop this, lieutenant. I promise." — Leon Scott Kennedy

description.mainEffect: Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability. While the Killer is carrying another Survivor, you see the Aura of every Hook within 56 meters of the pick-up location.
description.secondaryEffect: The Auras of regular Hooks are revealed to you in white and Scourge Hooks in yellow. Unlocks the ability to sabotage Hooks without a Toolbox.
description.additionalEffect: Sabotaging a Hook without a Toolbox takes 2.3 seconds, with a cool-down of 70/65/60 seconds.

description.mainEffect: While holding a depleted Toolbox, Scavenger activates.
description.secondaryEffect: Great Repairing Skill Checks grant 1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens. Reaching maximum Tokens automatically recharges the Toolbox.
description.additionalEffect: Recharging reduces Repair speed by -50% for 40/35/30 seconds. Scavenger grants the ability to rummage through an opened Chest once per Trial, guaranteeing a basic Toolbox.

description.mainEffect: When inside the Terror Radius, looking at the Killer causes you to scream and reveal their Aura for 3/4/5 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: A 50% chance to scream again extends the Aura-reveal duration by another 2 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Scene Partner has a cool-down of 60 seconds.

description.mainEffect: When you heal another Survivor for the equivalent of 1 Health State, Second Wind activates.
description.secondaryEffect: After being unhooked or unhooking yourself, you suffer from the Broken Status Effect until Second Wind deactivates.
description.additionalEffect: Automatically heals 1 Health State after 28/24/20 seconds. Deactivates if healed by Second Wind or if put into the Dying State.

description.mainEffect: Unlocks the Self-Care ability, allowing you to self-heal without needing a Med-Kit.
description.secondaryEffect: Self-heals at 25/30/35% of normal Healing speed.

description.mainEffect: When another Survivor is hit within 16 meters of you, Self-Preservation activates.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses Scratch Marks, Grunts of Pain, and Bleeding for 6/8/10 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "Something I learnt in the industry: when the axe is swinging, keep your head down." — Yun-Jin Lee

description.mainEffect: Increases the number of available Self-Unhook attempts by +3.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases the odds of a successful Self-Unhook attempt by 2/3/4%.

description.mainEffect: Receive an auditory warning when looking in the direction of Totems in a 45° cone within 8/10/12 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Small Game has a cool-down of 14/12/10 seconds each time it activates.
description.additionalEffect: Each Dull or Hex Totem cleansed reduces the Detection cone's angle by 5°, down to a minimum of 20°.

description.mainEffect: Stunning the Killer with a Pallet triggers Smash Hit, granting a +50% Haste Status Effect for 4 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 30/25/20 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "I have dealt with psychopaths in suits. You're just uglier and worse dressed." — Yun-Jin Lee

description.mainEffect: Each time another Survivor is killed, Sole Survivor gains 1 Token up to 3 Tokens.
description.secondaryEffect: Grants a radius per Token where you are immune to the Killer's Aura-reading abilities.
description.additionalEffect: When the last Survivor, Repair, Gate, and Hatch Opening speeds increase. "It was the boogeyman." — Laurie Strode

description.mainEffect: While injured and healing another Survivor without a Med-Kit, you passively heal yourself at 40/45/50% of your Altruistic Healing speed.
description.additionalEffect: "Showing up when things get rough, listening to people's problems, and supporting those in need; that's how you become stronger, that's how you grow." — Jane Romero

description.mainEffect: After being healed or recovering from the Dying State, grants the Endurance Status Effect for 4/6/8 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Endurance is cancelled when performing Conspicuous Actions.
description.additionalEffect: When Cursed, grants the ability to fully recover from the Dying State. Has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Increases Action speeds in various activities by 2/4/6% when the Killer is within 36 meters and looking at you.
description.secondaryEffect: This effect lingers for 0.5 seconds after the Killer loses line of sight.
description.additionalEffect: "There is a voice that doesn't use words. Listen." — Sassy, The Lost Tapes

description.mainEffect: Starting to run triggers Sprint Burst, granting a +50% Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Causes the Exhausted Status Effect for 60/50/40 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "See you if you can catch up..." — Meg Thomas

description.mainEffect: Every 15 seconds within the Killer's Terror Radius while not being chased, Stake Out gains 1 Token.
description.secondaryEffect: Good Skill Checks consume 1 Token and are considered Great Skill Checks.
description.additionalEffect: "We're gonna close this case!" — Detective David Tapp

description.mainEffect: Increases the Efficiency of your Items by 15/20/25%.
description.secondaryEffect: Extends its effect to other Survivors within 8 meters and lingers for 15 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "You're doing it wrong! Let me show you how it's done." — Nea Karlsson

description.mainEffect: Unlocks the Strength in Shadows ability to self-heal without a Med-Kit at 70% of normal Healing speed.
description.secondaryEffect: After healing in the Basement, reveals the Killer's Aura for 6/8/10 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "I'm getting out of here, if it's the last thing I do." — Sable

description.mainEffect: After another Survivor finishes healing you, Teamwork activates, suppressing Scratch Marks.
description.secondaryEffect: Stays active as long as you both remain within 12 meters of each other or until one of you loses a Health State.
description.additionalEffect: Has a cool-down of 180/160/140 seconds. "I'm good, I'm good... but keep it down." — Renato Lyra

description.mainEffect: Whenever you finish healing another Survivor, Teamwork: Power of Two activates, and both you and the healed Survivor benefit from the following effect: Grants a 5% Haste Status Effect for as long as you stay within 12 meters of one another or one of you loses a Health State.
description.secondaryEffect: Teamwork: Power of Two has a cool-down of 180/160/140 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Survivors can only be affected by one instance of Teamwork: Power of Two at a time. "You good? Then keep up!" — Thalita Lyra

description.mainEffect: When repairing a Generator, reduces the audible range of your Repair noises by -8 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Suppresses the explosion and accompanying Loud Noise Notification when failing a Skill Check. Failing a Skill Check instantly regresses the Generator by 5/4/3% of its maximum possible Progression in addition to the default Progression penalty.
description.additionalEffect: "I am gonna stealth this one." — Feng Min

description.mainEffect: Increases your Crawling speed by 30/40/50%.
description.secondaryEffect: Grants the ability to crawl and recover at the same time. Reduces the volume of Grunts of Pain while in the Dying State by -75%.
description.additionalEffect: "What the hell is this? I'm taking this bastard down!" — Detective David Tapp

description.mainEffect: Increases the Success zone of Great Skill Checks while Repairing and Healing by 10/20/30% when in the Injured State.
When you are chased by the Killer, the Aura of the Generator with the most progress is revealed to you.
description.secondaryEffect: The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 4/5/6 seconds after dropping a Pallet. These effects linger for 6/8/10 seconds after ending the Chase, after which Troubleshooter deactivates.
description.additionalEffect: "Nothing gets done around here if I don't do it." — Gabriel Soma

description.mainEffect: Once per Trial, you can completely recover from the Dying State.
description.secondaryEffect: Your Recovery speed is increased by 25/30/35%.
description.additionalEffect: "Goddammit, I am seriously FUBAR!" — Bill Overbeck

description.mainEffect: For every Survivor still in the Trial, Up the Ante is granted +1 Token. Increases the odds of every Survivor succeeding a Self-Unhook attempt by a stackable 1/2/3% per Token, up to a maximum of 3/6/9%.
description.additionalEffect: "What can I say? I'm just a very lucky guy... I'm sure some of it will rub off on you." — Ace Visconti

description.mainEffect: Increases your Crouching Movement speed by 90/95/100%.
description.additionalEffect: "The paint is still fresh but I am long gone." — Nea Karlsson

description.mainEffect: Increases your Recovery rate from various Status Effects by 20/25/30%.
description.secondaryEffect: This effect also applies to all other Survivors within 8 meters of your location and lingers for 15 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "I am gonna be here when you wake up. You are gonna make it." — Quentin Smith

description.mainEffect: The Auras of Generators are revealed to you within 32 meters.
description.secondaryEffect: Each time a Generator is completed, Visionary is deactivated for 20/18/16 seconds.

description.mainEffect: Once all Generators are completed, Wake Up! activates: The Auras of the Exit Gate Switches are revealed to you within 128 meters. Your Aura is revealed to all other Survivors within 128 meters of your location while opening an Exit Gate.
description.secondaryEffect: Increases your Gate Opening speed by 15/20/25%.
description.additionalEffect: "Ok, look. If we survive the next 24 hours, then I'll take you out on a real date." — Quentin Smith

description.mainEffect: Increases your Altruistic Healing speed by 100% for the next 30/60/90 seconds whenever you rescue another Survivor from a Hook.
description.additionalEffect: "I am confident we can all escape in one piece if we help each other."

description.mainEffect: Increases your Healing speed by 100% when healing a dying Survivor. Performing specific actions grants +1 Token to We're Gonna Live Forever.
description.secondaryEffect: Any dying Survivor healed benefits from the Endurance Status Effect for 6/8/10 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: "Come on then, let's ave' it! I don't give a shit pal." — David King

description.mainEffect: Grants the ability to successfully unhook yourself when hooked inside the Basement.
description.secondaryEffect: The Aura of the Killer is revealed to you for 16/18/20 seconds after unhooking yourself or being unhooked.
description.additionalEffect: "I haven't let anyone get in my way before. You think I'm gonna start now?" — Sable

description.mainEffect: The Auras of Breakable Walls, Pallets, and Windows are revealed to you within 24/28/32 meters.
description.additionalEffect: "Rise and shine, work hard, carve out your name, Take aim, pull the trigger, hit the bulls eye for fame, Know the value of faith, an' family, and don't you complain, Open wide, your windows of opportunity" — Kate Denson's "Windows of Opportunity"

description.mainEffect: After repairing Generators for a total of 50%, Wiretap activates: Press the Active Ability button while near a partially progressed Generator to install a Trap, which stays active for 100/110/120 seconds.
description.secondaryEffect: Whenever the Killer comes within 14 meters of the Trapped Generator, their Aura is revealed to all Survivors. Wiretap deactivates after the Generator is damaged or once the timer runs out.
description.additionalEffect: The Auras of Trapped Generators are revealed to all Survivors in yellow.

description.mainEffect: Press the Active Ability button while standing and motionless to enter the Performance interaction that lasts up to 15 seconds and empowers other Survivors within 16 metres of your location.
description.secondaryEffect:
The empowering effect depends on the result of you rolling a d20 and lasts for 90 seconds after completing the Performance:
1: You scream, but without notifying the Killer.
2 - 10: Skill Checks grant +1 % Progression.
11 - 19: Skill Checks grant +2 % Progression.
20: Skill Checks grant +3 % Progression
description.additionalEffect: Bardic Inspiration has a cool-down of 60 seconds.

description.mainEffect: After repairing Generators for a total of 50 %, Mirrored Illusion activates.
description.secondaryEffect: Press the Active Ability button when next to either a Chest, Exit Gate, Generator or a Totem to spawn a Static Illusion that lasts for 100/110/120 seconds.
description.additionalEffect: Mirrored Illusion deactivates after triggering successfully.

description.mainEffect: After standing still for 6/5/4 seconds, Still Sight activates.
description.secondaryEffect: While in Still Sight, the Auras of the Killer as well as any Chests and Generators within 24 meters of your location are revealed to you until you start moving again.
